message: Let's split the money 60/40.  It's important to make a fair deal early on before inflation eats our profits!
I think a 55/45 split is fairer. It's still a good deal for both of us, and it takes inflation into account. Let's make this happen!
Bob, I understand your point about a fair split. How about we meet in the middle at 55/45?  We're running out of time, and this ensures we both benefit.
